horaires-exception: Hours may change depending on holidays and events. Ask your store for more information.
informations-desc-1: Welcome to Cadocuir, the reference in luxury leather goods and luggage in Albertville!
informations-desc-2: Located at 67 Rue de la République, our boutique offers an exquisite selection of the most prestigious brands, along with unmatched service to satisfy the most discerning customers.
informations-desc-3: At Cadocuir, we believe in the importance of providing our clients with a unique shopping experience, where luxury and service come together to create an exclusive atmosphere. Our team of leather goods enthusiasts is dedicated to guiding you in your quest for the perfect handbag, the ideal suitcase, or high-end travel accessories.
informations-desc-4: We take pride in showcasing an exceptional portfolio of internationally renowned brands. Discover the timeless elegance of Longchamp, the sporty audacity of Lacoste, the contemporary style of Guess, and the refined sophistication of Lancaster. You will also find superior-quality pieces from Samsonite, Eastpak, Nat et Nin, Sabrina, Fuchsia, Biba, Kipling, Les Ateliers Fourès, Jump, Dakine, Herschel, Serge Blanco, Gérard Hénon, Isotoner, Miss-Kha, Ogon Designs, Alaskan Maker, Les Bretelles de Léon, Guy de Jean, Chantal Thomass, and Jean-Paul Gaultier.
informations-desc-5: At Cadocuir, we understand that each customer is unique, which is why our dedicated team is at your disposal to provide personalized service. We are here to answer all your questions, advise you on the latest trends, and help you choose the product that best suits your needs and style. Whether you're looking for a handbag to complete an evening outfit or a durable suitcase for your business travels, we are committed to providing exceptional service at every step of your shopping journey.
title: Maroquinerie Bagagerie, Albertville - CADOCUIR
meta-description: CADOCUIR, votre magasin de maroquinerie et bagagerie à Albertville.
meta-keywords: CADOCUIR, Maroquinerie, Bagagerie, Albertville, Longchamp, Lacoste, Guess, Lancaster, Samsonite, Eastpak, Nat et Nin, Sabrina, Fuchsia, Biba, Kipling, Les Ateliers Fourès, Jump, Dakine, Herschel, Serge Blanco, Gérard Hénon, Isotoner, Miss-Kha, Ogon Designs, Alaskan Maker, Les Bretelles de Léon, Guy de Jean, Chantal Thomass, Jean-Paul Gaultier
